classDiagram
    class Task {
        +int id
        +string title
        +string priority
        +string status
        +create()
        +update()
        +delete()
    }

        +Map~int, Task~ tasks
        +createTask()
        +getTask()
        +listTasks()
        +deleteTask()
    }

    class Priority {
        <<enumeration>>
        LOW
        MEDIUM
        HIGH
        CRITICAL
    }

    class TaskStatus {
        <<enumeration>>
        PENDING
        IN_PROGRESS
        REVIEW
        COMPLETED
    }

    Task "1" *-- "1" TaskStatus : has
    TaskManager "1" --> "*" Task : manages
